name: unchildlike
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not typical of a child, or not behaving like a child: There was a most unchildlike determination in her expression. It's disturbing to read about children engaging in behaviours that are so un-childlike.
More examplesFewer examplesNeither of the two sisters complains about their unchildlike childhoods. Working children and child violence are highlighted as examples of unchildlike behaviour. His behaviour is often excused because he's a child, except he is disturbingly unchildlike.The memoirs are vivid, engrossing, and surprisingly unchildlike.
